dcterms:description: The EndoVis2018 dataset is used for robotic scene segmentation, providing a collection of surgical videos for training and evaluation of segmentation models.
dcterms:title: EndoVis2018

dcterms:description: The EndoVis2017 dataset is utilized for robotic instrument segmentation, consisting of videos with annotated surgical instruments for model training and evaluation.
dcterms:title: EndoVis2017
